message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. It's a fair price considering the value you'll get from it.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not comfortable with $125. Can you meet me at $115? I'm willing to compromise, but I really want to stay within my budget.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I think the product is worth more than $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $130 to make it worth my while.
I understand that you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with $130. I'm willing to go up to $125, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're trying to be as close to your budget as possible, but I'm not willing to go below $135. I think it's a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need $135.
